name: The Slime's Paradox
description:
A submission for the Brackey's Game Jam. You are a slime exploring a dungeon with an ancient treasure. Once you get there you find an option  TO GET THE TREASURE AGAIN? and with that you begin to travel back in time again and again to collect more and more treasure. How many times can you do this. and what happens if you meet your past self... Find out in this engaging platformer where your only enemy is your past. Use WASD or the arrow keys to move.

WARNING : for some reason score counter and other features may not show up unless full screen is on so FULL SCREEN IS RECOMMENDED!
